page.title: 12AN INDUSTRIAL ESTATE
page.content: There are several small industrial estates on the outskirts of Cranleigh, two of them in disused Brickworks, but we went to visit the oldest one called Little Mead Estate. There are many different types of firm in different types of building in a quiet cul de sac. The Home Counties Dairy have a big depot and the new Ambulance Station is there. Another firm are importers of Italian Motorcycles. A company who make Electronic Flow Meters said they came to Cranleigh because they needed more space and they had no trouble finding employees, they did find the distance from London was a problem. Another wholesale book company said it did not matters where they were because they did business by mail order and they found the premises and facilities ideal.
